title: Pokémon: Advanced Challenge
description: A shadow hovers over Ash, May, and friends as they continue their journey through the Hoenn region, and it’s not just that of Mt. Chimney—both Team Magma and Team Aqua put plans into action with our heroes caught in the middle! When not foiling evil schemes, Ash and May chase their personal goals, with Ash battling for three more Gym Badges and May winning her first three Contest Ribbons. The group also gains new Pokémon like Torkoal and Bulbasaur, but could they be too much to handle?

media.title: What You Seed is What You Get
media.description: When Ash's Treecko and Corphish face Grovyle and Slugma in a Double Battle, Treecko turns the tables, learning to use Bullet Seed.

media.title: Let Bagons Be Bagons
media.description: A Trainer learns that Pokémon battling requires more than tactics and technology. Meanwhile, a Bagon dreams the impossible dream of taking flight.

media.title: The Princess and the Togepi
media.description: An invitation to the Togepi Festival brings Misty to the Hoenn region, where she learns that a local kingdom bases its rule on the whims of passing Togepi.

media.title: A Togepi Mirage!
media.description: Our heroes go up against an evil regent who would use Misty's Togepi to steal the throne from its rightful heir!

media.title: Candid Camerupt!
media.description: Ash, Brock, May, and Max must all work together to face the four members of a family of skilled Pokémon Trainers and their powerful Pokémon.

media.title: Love at First Flight
media.description: Our heroes discover a love story between two Trainers who star with their Pokémon in a local dance festival.

media.title: I Feel Skitty!
media.description: After she finds an exhausted Skitty, May entrusts it to a local aromatherapy lab, where it recovers completely.

media.title: ZigZag Zangoose
media.description: An old acquaintance gains confidence and strengthens his bond with his Zangoose when he is forced to face Seviper in a less than fair battle.

media.title: Maxxed Out!
media.description: Max meets another young boy who shares his name but differs greatly in personality. When this young and inexperienced new acquaintance goes off on his own, Ash and friends must track him down.

media.title: Pros and Con Artists
media.description: As May prepares for her second contest, Ash faces her rival Drew in a pre-contest battle.

media.title: Come What May!
media.description: May enters her second contest, where she's up against a mysterious Coordinator who bears a strong resemblance to a certain member of Team Rocket…

media.title: Cheer Pressure
media.description: Ash and friends meet an old friend who has since joined a Pokémon pep squad. When they expose his squad for a fake, the Trainer is inspired to start anew.

media.title: Game Winning Assist
media.description: When Team Rocket threatens a Numel ranch, Ash and friends drive them away, with May's Skitty using Assist for the first time.

media.title: Fight for the Meteorite
media.description: When Team Aqua and Team Magma battle over control of a meteorite on Mt. Chimney, Ash and friends must put an end to both groups' dastardly plans.

media.title: Poetry Commotion!
media.description: No sooner has Ash begun an official battle with a novice Gym Leader, Flannery, than Team Rocket interrupts, postponing the battle for an extra day.
